Moderation Queue ·  The official Akismet blog				









How ConvertKit is using AI to protect the creator economy from spam
TL;DR The stakes are always high when it comes to spam prevention. But especially for a platform like ConvertKit, which offers contact forms, email marketing automation, and e-commerce tools for over 428,000 creators – the stakes were higher. Their billing model, the email reputation of its customers, and ConvertKit’s own reputation were on the line. […]
